Electronic diary

Backhand for my project electronic diary for primary school.

About the project

This is a project I did as a final test for a Java junior course. My task was to make an electronic school diary that would have the given functionalities. Some of them are:

  • Login of admins, professors, students, parents, where each of them has different possibilities for data manipulation.
  • The role of the administrator is to add, change and delete data related to professors, class, class, students, he can also perform a search according to various criteria.
  • Professors can enter grades only for the subject they teach, and only to those students they teach
  • Students can check their grades, as can their parents.
  • When the professor enters the grade, parents receive a message on their e-mail with information about the subject and the grade that their child received.
  • Every addition, deletion, or change in the application is recorded.

    • You can find the code for this project on my github account. I also took a few screenshots while testing some of the features of the project using Postman, which you can see here.

Techniques I used :

JAVA Spring Hibernate
REST MySql Postman
JSON ArgoUML GitHub
